title: I can't close open apps. Swiping is not making Spotify stop, I don't have an "X" to stop.
content: When Spotify or NPR are active and I want them to stop, I don't get an "x" to stop the app and swiping around (left, right, up or down) does not make it stop.  The music or program is still going even when the app doesn't look active.  I have to shut the phone off to get out.
